# TickingAreaOptions Interface

> [!CAUTION]
> This interface is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

Options to create a ticking area using the [*@minecraft/server.TickingAreaManager*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/TickingAreaManager.md).

## Properties

### **dimension**
`dimension: Dimension;`

The dimension the ticking area will be in.

Type: [*Dimension*](Dimension.md)

### **from**
`from: Vector3;`

Corner block location of the bounding box.

Type: [*Vector3*](Vector3.md)

### **to**
`to: Vector3;`

Opposite corner block location of the bounding box.

Type: [*Vector3*](Vector3.md)
